title: Wincob
author: Wincob
content: Between optimism vs lido dao which project do you think is best to buy in this dips?

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: I will buy both. Both have the same potential. It's hard to pick one from them. That's why i prefer to take both as my long term investment. OP is also a very good second layer and lido dao is still getting hyped. I personally think that if you can get both and then why not? It's not always picking which one as the best thing to invest but sometime there are some projects that have the same potential as well.Think about that.

comments.author: DevFile90
comments.body: Quote from: Prince Malik on August 21, 2022, 01:28:33 PMQuote from: MFahad on August 21, 2022, 02:30:26 AMQuote from: Wincob on August 20, 2022, 06:41:48 PMBetween optimism vs lido dao which project do you think is best to buy in this dips? Both are looking good for long term. We may see very soon trend of DAO and Layers 2. Between these two I will give more value to layers 2 then DAO because DAo system is little bit complicated then Layers 2. Optimism,Azero,snx and Matic are some top class Coin which can be top 20 coin of the future. So I will be looking to fill a bag if I find them in dip Optimism was 0.49 around 1 month ago and i didn't wasted the opportunity to buy it since it pumped to 1.9$, now it get back to 1.2$ which i find it another good to opportunity to invest in layer 2 but be careful because Arbitrum could also launch their token which will create big competetio between the twoIs Optimism max supply not a barrier for you? The max supply is over a billion which sucks to me, I don't even understand how this token costs this much, maybe some part are locked or something, I think Lido Dao is better with this point of mine.

comments.author: Kalchef
comments.body: The best time to have accumulated this LIDO DAO was in July when BTC goes below 18,000$, this token was trading for 0.50$ at that time and even goes below 0.50$ for some hours I think, now its over 2$, this is the type of tokens that hit 10$ easily.

comments.author: BitKongy
comments.body: Lido DAO has a 1,000,000 total supply while Optimism has no max supply but over 4 Billion total supply, this looks like Ethereum to me but do not think that the value can't go over 20$ just because the max supply is infinite at the moment, to me Max supply doesn't matter anymore.

comments.author: FirmWars
comments.body: Quote from: BitKongy on August 21, 2022, 02:15:04 PMLido DAO has a 1,000,000 total supply while Optimism has no max supply but over 4 Billion total supply, this looks like Ethereum to me but do not think that the value can't go over 20$ just because the max supply is infinite at the moment, to me Max supply doesn't matter anymore. You are wrong, Max supply do matters because with low Max supply the token will easily pump even in a short term bull market, they easily appreciate in price since supply is very low, take a look at PYR token for example, millions of supply is better than billions of supply.

comments.author: kasunrandil
comments.body: i think investing in dao projects looks good now because l2 season was in last bull run. you remember most l2 projects  such as matic , imx and few of other went sky high in 2021. dao will be the next trend so focus on it. decentralized governence is becoming a main part of crypto project. i think polkadot will lead this hype in next run. focus on dao.

comments.author: S3300
comments.body: Quote from: kasunrandil on August 21, 2022, 03:02:01 PMi think investing in dao projects looks good now because l2 season was in last bull run. you remember most l2 projects  such as matic , imx and few of other went sky high in 2021. dao will be the next trend so focus on it. decentralized governence is becoming a main part of crypto project. i think polkadot will lead this hype in next run. focus on dao.Do not forget that most of these Dao projects are not strong, they are prone to getting hacked easily, more easier to hack than layer2, also I had few Dao since 2020 and they performed worse, for a surety result layer 2 is safer.

comments.author: CapGelatik
comments.body: Quote from: Wincob on August 20, 2022, 06:41:48 PMBetween optimism vs lido dao which project do you think is best to buy in this dips? Layer 2 is a project to make gas fees cheap, because we know that Ethereum has expensive gas fees, but if Ethereum merges make gas fees cheap, then layer 2 might be threatened, so I recommend investing in DAO only

comments.author: Cryptornd
comments.body: Quote from: Wincob on August 20, 2022, 06:41:48 PMBetween optimism vs lido dao which project do you think is best to buy in this dips?  choice is yours  mate. but i.m.o Dao  is a new concept that  still in the early state ofcource. it's  better  being touch with Dao.  decentralization is  a major component in cryptocurrency industry. so who can  say  dao wont be? the bottom of dao  is  decentralization .
